languages.text: "Немногое, но я стараюсь узнать больше, поскольку они наведываются в мой отсек". {n}Френзо задумчиво скребет затылок.{/n} "Ткачи почитают Императора через смерть: убивают отъявленных мерзавцев и еретиков, а иногда праведников или вообще случайных людей... У них мрачные ритуалы и странные молитвы, в которых обычному человеку нипочем не разобраться".

traits.locale_text: "Немногое, но я стараюсь узнать больше, поскольку они наведываются в мой отсек". {n}Френзо задумчиво скребет затылок.{/n} "Ткачи почитают Императора через смерть: убивают отъявленных мерзавцев и еретиков, а иногда и праведников или вообще случайных людей... У них мрачные ритуалы и странные молитвы, в которых обычному человеку нипочем не разобраться".

languages.text: "Not much, but I'm always trying to learn more, given that they like to pay visits to my compartment." {n}Frensoe scratches his head, thinking.{/n} "The spinners honour the Emperor through death: they kill notorious reprobates and heretics. Sometimes they kill righteous folk, and other times even seemingly at random... Their rituals are morbid and their prayers are strange — anyone not initiated in their rites would struggle to make any sense of them."

У них мрачные ритуалы и странные молитвы, в которых обычному человеку нипочем не разобраться".

Sometimes they kill righteous folk, and other times even seemingly at random... Their rituals are morbid and their prayers are strange — anyone not initiated in their rites would struggle to make any sense of them."

languages.text: «No mucho, pero siempre intento descubrir cosas nuevas, visto lo mucho que les gusta visitar mi compartimento». {n}Frensoe se rasca la cabeza, pensativo.{/n} «Los tejedores honran al Emperador a través de la muerte: matan a herejes y réprobos de renombre. A veces matan a gente inocente y, en ocasiones, parece que matan por matar... Tienen unos rituales muy morbosos y unas plegarias de lo más extrañas: quien no conozca sus ritos tendrá dificultades para encontrarles sentido».
languages.original_text: "Not much, but I'm always trying to learn more, given that they like to pay visits to my compartment." {n}Frensoe scratches his head, thinking.{/n} "The spinners honour the Emperor through death: they kill notorious reprobates and heretics. Sometimes they kill righteous folk, and other times even seemingly at random... Their rituals are morbid and their prayers are strange — anyone not initiated in their rites would struggle to make any sense of them."

traits.locale_text: «No mucho, pero siempre intento descubrir cosas nuevas, visto lo mucho que les gusta visitar mi compartimento». {n}Frensoe se rasca la cabeza, pensativo.{/n} «Los tejedores honran al Emperador a través de la muerte: matan a herejes y réprobos de renombre. A veces matan a gente inocente y, en ocasiones, parece que matan por matar... Tienen unos rituales muy morbosos y unas plegarias de lo más extrañas: quien no conozca sus ritos tendrá dificultades para encontrarles sentido».

languages.text: 「あまり詳しくありませんが、彼らはうちの区画によく訪れるので、前々からもっと情報を集めようと動いていました」{n}フレンソーは頭をかきながら思考を巡らせる。{/n}「織り手は死を通して皇帝を称えます。彼らは評判の悪い不信心者や異端者を手にかけるのです。ときに正しい人間を殺すこともあれば、無差別に殺すように見えるときもある…彼らの儀式はゾッとするもので、祈り方は異様です。儀式に参加していない者に内容を理解するのは難しいでしょうね」
languages.original_text: "Not much, but I'm always trying to learn more, given that they like to pay visits to my compartment." {n}Frensoe scratches his head, thinking.{/n} "The spinners honour the Emperor through death: they kill notorious reprobates and heretics. Sometimes they kill righteous folk, and other times even seemingly at random... Their rituals are morbid and their prayers are strange — anyone not initiated in their rites would struggle to make any sense of them."

traits.locale_text: 「あまり詳しくありませんが、彼らはうちの区画によく訪れるので、前々からもっと情報を集めようと動いていました」{n}フレンソーは頭をかきながら思考を巡らせる。{/n}「織り手は死を通して皇帝を称えます。彼らは評判の悪い不信心者や異端者を手にかけるのです。ときに正しい人間を殺すこともあれば、無差別に殺すように見えるときもある…彼らの儀式はゾッとするもので、祈り方は異様です。儀式に参加していない者に内容を理解するのは難しいでしょうね」

languages.text: “了解得不太多，但那些人总是会出现在我这片甲板上，所以我一直努力进一步了解他们。”{n}弗伦索挠着头，思考着。{/n}“那些织网者会通过死亡来祭拜帝皇，他们会杀死臭名昭著的恶棍和异端分子。不过，有的时候他们也会杀害正直的人，有时候甚至像是在随机杀人……他们的仪式非常病态，他们的祈祷也非常古怪。如果没有亲自参加过他们的仪式，恐怕很难理解他们。”
languages.original_text: "Not much, but I'm always trying to learn more, given that they like to pay visits to my compartment." {n}Frensoe scratches his head, thinking.{/n} "The spinners honour the Emperor through death: they kill notorious reprobates and heretics. Sometimes they kill righteous folk, and other times even seemingly at random... Their rituals are morbid and their prayers are strange — anyone not initiated in their rites would struggle to make any sense of them."

traits.locale_text: “了解得不太多，但那些人总是会出现在我这片甲板上，所以我一直努力进一步了解他们。”{n}弗伦索挠着头，思考着。{/n}“那些织网者会通过死亡来祭拜帝皇，他们会杀死臭名昭著的恶棍和异端分子。不过，有的时候他们也会杀害正直的人，有时候甚至像是在随机杀人……他们的仪式非常病态，他们的祈祷也非常古怪。如果没有亲自参加过他们的仪式，恐怕很难理解他们。”

languages.text: « Pas grand-chose, mais je cherche en permanence à en apprendre davantage, tant ils semblent s'être pris d'affection pour mon compartiment. » {n}Frensoe se gratte la tête d'un air songeur.{/n} « Les tisseurs rendent hommage à l'Empereur en semant la mort dans les rangs des hérétiques et des réprouvés. Mais il leur arrive également de tuer des individus bien sous tous rapports, et j'en viens même à me demander s'ils ne choisissent pas certaines de leurs cibles au hasard... Leurs rituels sont on ne peut plus morbides et leurs prières particulièrement étranges ; quiconque n'est pas un tant soit peu initié à leurs rites aurait bien du mal à les comprendre. »
languages.original_text: "Not much, but I'm always trying to learn more, given that they like to pay visits to my compartment." {n}Frensoe scratches his head, thinking.{/n} "The spinners honour the Emperor through death: they kill notorious reprobates and heretics. Sometimes they kill righteous folk, and other times even seemingly at random... Their rituals are morbid and their prayers are strange — anyone not initiated in their rites would struggle to make any sense of them."

traits.locale_text: « Pas grand-chose, mais je cherche en permanence à en apprendre davantage, tant ils semblent s'être pris d'affection pour mon compartiment. » {n}Frensoe se gratte la tête d'un air songeur.{/n} « Les tisseurs rendent hommage à l'Empereur en semant la mort dans les rangs des hérétiques et des réprouvés. Mais il leur arrive également de tuer des individus bien sous tous rapports, et j'en viens même à me demander s'ils ne choisissent pas certaines de leurs cibles au hasard... Leurs rituels sont on ne peut plus morbides et leurs prières particulièrement étranges ; quiconque n'est pas un tant soit peu initié à leurs rites aurait bien du mal à les comprendre. »

languages.text: "Nicht viel, aber ich versuche stets zu lernen, zumal sie meinem Modul gerne Besuche abstatten. {n}Frensoe kratzt sich nachdenklich am Kopf.{/n} "Die Spinner ehren den Imperator durch den Tod. Sie töten notorische Kriminelle und Ketzer. Ab und an töten sie auch rechtschaffene Leute und gelegentlich scheinbar willkürlich ... Ihre Rituale sind morbide und ihre Gebete seltsam ... wer nicht mit ihren Riten vertraut ist, hat Schwierigkeiten, einen Sinn darin zu erkennen."
languages.original_text: "Not much, but I'm always trying to learn more, given that they like to pay visits to my compartment." {n}Frensoe scratches his head, thinking.{/n} "The spinners honour the Emperor through death: they kill notorious reprobates and heretics. Sometimes they kill righteous folk, and other times even seemingly at random... Their rituals are morbid and their prayers are strange — anyone not initiated in their rites would struggle to make any sense of them."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht viel, aber ich versuche stets zu lernen, zumal sie meinem Modul gerne Besuche abstatten. {n}Frensoe kratzt sich nachdenklich am Kopf.{/n} "Die Spinner ehren den Imperator durch den Tod. Sie töten notorische Kriminelle und Ketzer. Ab und an töten sie auch rechtschaffene Leute und gelegentlich scheinbar willkürlich ... Ihre Rituale sind morbide und ihre Gebete seltsam ... wer nicht mit ihren Riten vertraut ist, hat Schwierigkeiten, einen Sinn darin zu erkennen."

languages.text: "Fazla bir şey bilmiyorum. Ama kompartımanıma uğramaktan keyif aldıkları için sürekli daha fazla bilgi edinmeye çalışıyorum." {n}Frensoe, kafasını kaşıyarak düşünüyor.{/n} "Dokurlar, İmparator'u ölümle onurlandırıyor. Azılı serserileri ve kâfirleri öldürüyorlar. Bazen erdemli insanları öldürüyorlar. Bazen de öldürdükleri kişiler rastgele gibi duruyor... Ayinleri ürkütücü, duaları da bir tuhaf. Ayinlerine katılmayanlar, bunlardan bir anlam çıkarmakta zorlanabilir."
languages.original_text: "Not much, but I'm always trying to learn more, given that they like to pay visits to my compartment." {n}Frensoe scratches his head, thinking.{/n} "The spinners honour the Emperor through death: they kill notorious reprobates and heretics. Sometimes they kill righteous folk, and other times even seemingly at random... Their rituals are morbid and their prayers are strange — anyone not initiated in their rites would struggle to make any sense of them."
